columns.name: the_geom
columns.description: Geometry column

columns.name: BoroCode
columns.description: The numerical borough code for the exclusive pedestrian signal.

columns.name: BoroName
columns.description: The name of the borough where the exclusive pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: BoroCD
columns.description: The three digit number that represents the borough and the community district.

columns.name: CounDist
columns.description: The Council District where the exclusive pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: AssemDist
columns.description: The Assembly District where the exclusive pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: StSenDist
columns.description: The State Senate District where the exclusive pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: CongDist
columns.description: The Congressional District where the exclusive pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: Main Street
columns.description: The major street where the signal was installed on. This intersection has greater traffic volume, larger cross-section, and higher functional class.

columns.name: Cross Street
columns.description: The minor street where the signal was installed on. This intersection is likely to have less traffic volume, a smaller cross-section and a lower functional classification than the major street.

columns.name: Barnes Dance
columns.description: An intersection where car traffic halts for a pre-determined time for pedestrians to cross in all directions free of conflicts.

columns.name: Modified Barnes Dance
columns.description: The timing of the signals are changed/modified to allow pedestrians additional time for movement during the first phase of a signalized intersection.

columns.name: Mid-Block Crossing
columns.description: Allow pedestrians a formally designated place to cross a street when intersections are spaced too far apart to be convenient.

columns.name: T- Oneway Away- 24 hour Walk
columns.description: Exclusive pedestrian crossing applies to the signal all the time (24/7.)

columns.name: T- Oneway Away- All Walk in Phase B
columns.description: Allow pedestrians to cross when all cars stop on the main (the major) street.

columns.name: Installation Date
columns.description: The date of implementation of exclusive treatment on the intersection.

columns.name: NTAName
columns.description: The name of the New York City neighborhood the signal was installed.

columns.name: FEMAFldz
columns.description: FEMA flood zone code for the exclusive pedestrian signal intersection.

columns.name: FEMAFldT
columns.description: FEMA flood zone description for the exclusive pedestrian signal intersection.

columns.name: HrcEvac
columns.description: The hurricane evacuation zone of the exclusive pedestrian signal.

options: City Clerk & Clerk of the Council (OCC)
Department of Consumer and Worker Protection (DCWP)
Department of Health and Mental Hygiene (DOHMH)
Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD)
Department of Records and Information Services (DORIS)
Department of Youth and Community Development (DYCD)
Fire Department Pension Fund & Related Funds
Fire Department of New York City (FDNY)
Mayor's Office of Climate and Environmental Justice (MOCEJ)
Mayor's Office of Climate and Sustainability
Mayor's Office of Ethnic and Community Media (MOECM)
Mayor's Office of Housing Recovery Operations (HRO)
Mayor's Office of Media And Entertainment (MOME)
Mayor's Office of Recovery and Resiliency
Mayor's Office of the Chief Technology Officer (MOCTO)
Mayor’s Office of Community Mental Health (OCMH)
Mayor’s Office to End Domestic and Gender-Based Violence
Office of Administrative Trials and Hearings (OATH)
Office of Citywide Event Coordination and Management (CECM)
Office of Film, Theatre, and Broadcasting (FILM)
Port Authority of New York & New Jersey (PANYNJ)
Public Design Commission (formerly Art Commission (ARTCOM) and Design Commission)
fields.name: Agency

view.description: Exclusive Pedestrian Signal or Barnes Dance are installed at traffic intersections to allow pedestrian exclusive time to cross the street at all directions while stopping all traffic.
view.emailShareUrl: mailto:?subject=Exclusive Pedestrian Signal (Barnes Dance) Locations&body=Here is a dataset from NYC Open Data that I would like to share with you: https%3A%2F%2Fdata.cityofnewyork.us%2FTransportation%2FExclusive-Pedestrian-Signal-Barnes-Dance-Locations%2F8kuj-2n3u

computedColumns.name: Zip Codes
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Zip Codes' (efsh-h5xi) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

computedColumns.name: Community Districts
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Community Districts' (f5dn-yrer) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

computedColumns.name: Borough Boundaries
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Borough Boundaries' (yeji-bk3q) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

computedColumns.name: City Council Districts
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'City Council Districts' (92fq-4b7q) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

computedColumns.name: Police Precincts
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Police Precincts' (sbqj-enih) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
